Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 8th march 2012 transit jfk frankly commend service job guys fancy clean quiet fairly comfy beds pure relief longhaul flight descent bath sleep noticed niche transit passengers probably help requested 4th floor sitting airport hours waiting connecting flight

Reviews.Content: overnight package emirate bathroom clean basic narrow view food nice plentiful arrived night staff helpful courteous getting airport expected staff try accomodate overnight rest continuing journey worth free service emirates compare staying airport suffering extended journey economy class time tours dubai getting flight consider using hotelservice journey stayed 11 nov 2011
